Solution: Added ML-based exit signal system that:

1. Checks positions every 60 seconds when in ANY loss
2. Checks every 30 seconds when approaching stop-loss (within 3%)
3. Uses ML model to predict if market is turning against position
4. Exits if:
   - LONG position + ML predicts SELL (>55% conf)
   - SHORT position + ML predicts BUY (>55% conf)

Example: AAVE SHORT entry $218.90, instead of waiting for stop at $221.25 (-$10),
ML could detect bearish momentum ending at $220 and exit at only -$4.

Benefits:
- Reduces average loss per trade
- ML learns from both entries AND exits
- More adaptive to changing market conditions
